_comment: This is a translation from the original English to Persian. For a better tranlsation meaning, 'privacy' was translated as 'government censorship'. Unfinished.
sect1_description: .با افزایش برنامه های سانسور دولت، توكس برنامه هست که اجازه می دهد که شما را با دوستان و خانواده بدون سانسور تماس بگیرید
download_warning: Nightlies aren't for the weak of heart, you may encounter bugs, crashes, and large doses of frustration. You've been warned!
sect2_aboutbody: .توكس با این ایده درست شود که شما می توانید با دوستان و خانواده صحبت بکنید بدون در حال جاسوسی از دولت
Instant messaging, video conferencing, a: Instant messaging, video conferencing, and more
sect3_messages_blurb:
At your fingertips.
 You're always in the loop with instant encrypted messaging.
sect3_voice_blurb:
Stay in touch.
 Make free and secure qTox to qTox calls.
sect3_video_blurb:
Seeing is believing.
 Catch up face to face with a secure video call.
sect4_security_blurb:
qTox takes your privacy seriously.
With leading-class encryption, you can rest assured knowing that the only people reading your messages are the ones you send them to.
sect4_easy_blurb: Unlike other secure messaging solutions, qTox does not require you to be a computer programmer to use it. qTox comes out-of-the-box with an easy-to-use interface that allows you to focus on your conversations.
sect4_freedom_blurb: qTox is both free for you to use, and free for you to change. You are completely free to both use and modify qTox. Furthermore, qTox will never harass you with ads, or require you to pay for features.
sect5_github: Want to help? We're on GitHub. No coding experience is necessary.
We're cool folks from <span class=\"text: We're cool guys from all around the world.
sect6_githubtoirc: Start your own project and ask us on GitHub, or in IRC!
donate_about: To see how you can help out by donating, please visit our donations page. Thank you!
